snippet.title: The Chronicler Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
From Octavi Navarro, creator of the critically acclaimed short games Midnight Scenes, The Librarian, and The Supper, comes The Chronicler, a peculiar fantasy Open-World RPG where you are the author of your own adventure.

Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1614620/The_Chronicler/

Enjoy the journey and write your own experience!

---------------------------------------

Also, you can follow us on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/OctaviNavarro
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/octavinavarroAG
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/octavi_navarro
